description: Jackson Cooper has been fucking up at work lately, but luckily for him, boss man Rod Peterson is in need of someone who doesn't mind doing some fucking at work. Rod has an inclination that Jackson is just the guy for the job he needs done, and when Jackson wraps his lips around Rod's hard on, he realizes he's chosen correctly. After returning the favor, Rod decides to see if Jackson is flexible enough to handle different positions, and Jackson truly shines, as he bends over and takes Rod's rod before mounting him and giving him the ride of his life. They nearly break the furniture in Rod's office as Jackson shows how hard of a worker he really can be. Rod erupts and empties himself all over Jackson's hole as Jackson shoots an impressive load all over himself, leaving Rod very impressed with Jackson's abilities going forward with the company. Job well done! Enjoy!
title: Special Skills Required
